channel.title: INtopBackup

item.title: Two men found dead while searching for Bigfoot
item.description: Officials started searching for the pair on Christmas after a relative reported them missing.

item.title: Madoff fraud victims get $4.3bn as fund completes payouts
item.description: Victims of one of the biggest frauds in US history set to recover more than 90% of proven losses.

item.description: The FBI believes their homes were targeted as part of the larger trend involving organized crime groups.

item.title: Jimmy Carter: Many evolutions for a centenarian ‘citizen of the world’

item.description: A U.S. official says arrests for illegally crossing the border from Mexico in December are little changed from a month earlier.

item.title: LAX air traffic controller steps in to avoid near collision on runway

item.title: Jimmy Carter will have funeral services in Plains, Ga., Atlanta and Washington, D.C.
item.description: Former President Jimmy Carter's state funeral services will span six days, three cities and multiple places of significance from his life.

item.title: Photos: Former President Carter redefined post-presidency role
item.description: The Nobel Peace Prize winner devoted himself to improving the health of people around the world, promoting democracy and resolving global conflicts.
